name: Air-Fryer Fries
author: Juliana Hale
summary: Crispy air-fried potatoes with all the crunch but none of the extra calories and fat. Serve with desired dipping sauce.
ingredients: 1 pound potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch sticks (straight or ruffle cut)
1/4 teaspoon seasoning (ideas below), or more to taste
directions: Cover potatoes with water and let soak for 30 minutes
Drain and pat dry with paper towels
Drizzle with oil; toss to coat
Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Arrange potatoes in a double layer in the fryer basket
Cook, tossing every 5 minutes, until golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes
Sprinkle with salt and desired seasoning
